body: Ask away, i'll answer honestly. Been a good 3 years though!

title: 3 year ama :)

replies.body:
You are really nice and sweet and easy to talk to, and we have had some funny times on Avicus and the build server :p

I want to become an architect, that is my dream

Blue or white :)

Oh i love it LOL

I have quite a few, I guess playing CTH when it was around in general was great :)

Yeah prestiges are a great thing and I am happy they are back though I probably will never rank up because I cant pvp xD

Thanks!

replies.body:
You are really nice to me and easy to talk to on discord etc. You are clearly really passionate about NewDawn and making it good which I respect and I know you will get us far :)

Apples or Strawberries

Either CoD or Uncharted 4 yeah im call of duty sweat

My favourite map has and probably always will be Decay

I honestly couldnt say, theres so many amazing people on this server

replies.body: I can literally tell you anything, you are my best friend on Avicus and couldn't ask for a better friend. Yeah you're blunt sometimes but who cares, you send me loads of random stuff and we have such fun times <3 you are really nice and always there, hope it stays like that :D
